function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Low scoring in flexibility and storage, impacting the ability to adapt spaces for disease prevention measures","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High scores for lighting and electricity domains, impacting energy efficiency and potential to reduce disease transmission","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low scores in dynamic envelope, domestic hot water, and heating domains","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Performance matrix indicates acceptable scores in the majority of criteria, but with some areas for improvement","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of on-site electricity generation and storage units","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low scores in energy management domains","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High impact score in majority of assessment criteria","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High scores in majority of impact criteria","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low scores in flexibility and storage criteria","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low ventilation score 89%","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low electricity score 17%","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High overall impact scores 72-80%","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low scores in electricity, domestic hot water, and dynamic envelope domains may lead to compromised living conditions, increasing the risk of illness and disease.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low ventilation and heating scores in the building domains","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low electricity domain score 17%","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low electricity domain score due to absence of on-site electricity generation and storage","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low domestic hot water and dynamic envelope scores","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of occupancy detection or motion sensors, and daylight sensors for lighting domain","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low level of control functionalities in the majority of domains","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Building lighting control is absent","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No daylight or motion sensors implemented in rooms","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reported information on ev charging capability may lead to unmonitored and unregulated usage, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread through surface contact on ev charging stations.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Partial building fault detection process may result in undetected issues with hvac systems, leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to simultaneously heat and cool rooms may lead to inconsistent temperature control, creating discomfort for occupants and potentially impacting their immune response, thereby increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of automatic operable windows or skylights","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited reporting of window and skylight position","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of smart windows","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of temperature control in individual rooms","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient coverage of relevant heating loads by meters","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of domestic hot water storage and control","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient local electricity production and storage for ev charging","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simultaneous heating and cooling limitations","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of smart grid integration","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective control of lighting systems leading to inadequate visibility and potential safety hazards.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient cooling system maintenance leading to poor temperature control and potential discomfort for occupants.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentration of people in healthcare building","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and humidity control","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of control over hot water supply","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Legislative constraints prevent the storage of locally produced electricity, leading to suboptimal consumption.","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant electricity loads are metered, leading to poor visibility and control over electricity consumption.","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of control over thermal exchanges and absence of fault-detection and diagnostics platform pose risks for maintaining indoor air quality and temperature regulation.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of individual room control for cooling may lead to uneven temperature distribution and poor ventilation in certain areas, increasing the risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on manual control for lighting and dynamic envelope elements may result in suboptimal use of natural light and ventilation, leading to indoor air quality issues and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reported thermal energy storage tes","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Less than 50% of relevant heating loads are metered","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No reporting on domestic hot water usage","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate building maps and characteristics","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation and auditing of current bacs involves physical interaction with building systems and devices.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"}]}
